ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Advice Sought
ygData.msgSnippet: You re a bard, don t solo. I found the best place for exp at level 24-27 was Mistmoore. I wizzed through these levels in a matter of days. Bards are excellent
ygData.messageBody:
You're a bard, don't solo. I found the best place for exp at level 24-27
was Mistmoore. I wizzed through these levels in a matter of days. Bards are
excellent in groups in Mistmoore as they can provide the invis song (for
train avoidance), healing and combat speed bonus's. There are plenty of
spawns in Mistmoore and in a good group you can get constant exp from
pulls. Stick to the wall on the side of the lake and you should avoid
trains. Gargoyles spawn on the bank with the tower and often they drops
Garg eyes (9pp each).

Best of luck, hope this info helps.

Madagan Songweaver, Bard that loves Mistmoore

Ps, Got my Hooded Black Cloak on Friday night, 1st drop from Cloaked
Dampyre.




"roleplay" <roleplay@...> on 22/03/2000 11:38:25

Please respond to eqbards@onelist.com

To: "Bards" <eqbards@onelist.com>
cc: (bcc: John Senior/M&G)
Subject: [eqbards] Advice Sought




From: "roleplay" <roleplay@...>

I am level 24 almost 25. Where can I solo for the next level ro 2 until
26/27?

I have heard the Hermit or Gargoyles but I am not sure what levels they
are.

Thank you.

Ranian Aleroth.
Bard of the 24th Song.



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
